posts.post_content:
Hello All....

I picked up this "missing Magenta Ink" "lite Magenta" T206 Beck on ebay last year and was thinking about submitting to SGC the past year but I never did....

Card appears to be "missing the magenta" color found in his Cuffs, Collar, stripes on the cap, "B" on cap, "B" on sleeve....Rest of card has normal colors and does not appear faded or chemically damaged...BUT IS RAW AND UNGRADED...

I have had many T206 Experts look at it, and most agree it is a legit "missing magenta" Boston Player like the Sweeney, Ferguson, Ritchey, Bates, Ect....

BUT I CANNOT GAURENTEE 100 % it is, NOR GAURENTEE PSA or SGC will grade as such (missing ink/missing magenta)because of their strictness on the missing magenta on factory cut cards recently I have heard from other collectors...Beck missing Magenta is a legit variation(CHECK T206 RESOURCE.COM for their example )


I will listen to offers...

or take Trade of T206 

1) rare backs=Lenox, B.L. 350, Uzit, C.B., Piedy 42, A.B. 460, 350,(singles or combos) ***CONDITION NOT A FACTOR***

2) unconfirmed T206

3) T206 Printers Scraps/ Hand cut / Missing colors / Freaks

4) Cash

ENTERTAIN ME:D

I am trying to upload scans now....but they are to large...

email me for multiple scans....


peace

Johnny
email me the scans and I will crop them and post them for you

its legit. i have one that is psa graded. it is not for sale.

[URL="http://thehoodedcoder.com/images/thumbnails-2.html"]Beck Missing Red Ink[/URL]
Johnny, can't wait to see this baby !!

Thanks guys....Thanks so much Chris.....

Taking offers....love a tuf back or scrap/freak for trade......:)
